answers.answer: You need sexual intercourse to become pregnant.so thats out of the question..since your period is irregular the frequent need for the loo.could be the oncoming of your period.you should discuss with your doctor if you think you maybe have diabetes,they will test you for this.

question: I have an irregular period. I haven't experienced one this month. I live with my boyfriend but we never had sex. It was sometimes, that we did some sort of sexual activity like finger and that too was with clothes and for a couple of minutes but never sex. I came to U.S. last month and it is big change for me here from Japan. I just eat my breakfast and then eats in the night. I have a problem of frequent urination and feeling thirsty but that is with for the past years. I was anemic last year. My father is diabetic. I am very much confused and worried?
title: Pregnancy or Diabetes?
